attributes.action: make the sale of all alcopops illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I grew up disliking the taste of wine and beer. Consequently I didn't want to try it again for many years. If it had tasted sweet and just like my favourite fizzy drink, of course I would have wanted more! If we want to discourage children from drinking alcohol lets make it taste like an adult drink again.
